2D Linear Dynamical System

2019, February 23

Animation

$$\frac{d}{dt} \begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} a _{11} & a _{12} \\ a _{21} & a _{22} \end{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} $$
